title: Jax exploit/hack?
body: I just played a game with a couple of my club members. On one certain game we were winning then out of no where a Jax took 4 towers, an Inhibitor, and a quadra kill under two minutes! No one helped him out it was just him solo. We just surrendered after that. Jax was too OP.

replies.body: You obviously dont know champions in the game you should have knowledge far beond your champion pool even if you have never played the champion taking towers is one of Jax's best strengths,  and surrendering rather than figureing out where things went wrong and where you can sure up your game play is what seems to screw me out of most of my games that I lose cause my team surrenders rather than work on getting bettter.
